業者名稱: 法商西華股份有限公司台灣分公司

ingredients: MASSACHUSETTS TYPE OF BRONCHITIS VIRUS....AT LEAST 10^2.63 EID50NDV B1 STRAIN.........AT LEAST 10^5.5 EID50
